Different Crime.Crime Name: Work Permit Refusal under Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
legal_basis: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, s. 20(1)b)
procedural_fairness: Judicial review analyzed each case individually, considering legal principles and factual distinctions.
evidence_assessment: Applicants' ties to Philippines (family, employment, financial status) were assessed. Some lacked credible employment evidence or had weak economic ties.
decision_outcome: Judicial review granted for two cases due to unreasonable decisions; dismissed for three others as decisions were within reason.
immigration_status: Visa Officers doubted applicants' intentions to return to Philippines based on weak ties.

Different Crime.Crime Name: Failure to provide required documentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
procedural_fairness: Officer acted reasonably; no breach of procedural fairness occurred
legal_basis: Under IRPA, applicants must prove they are not inadmissible. Subsection 16(1) requires submission of all relevant documents.
evidence_assessment: Applicant failed to provide UK tax returns despite being given time and reminders
decision_outcome: Court upheld officer's decision; judicial review dismissed
standard_of_review: Judicial review assessed whether officer's decision met procedural fairness and legal standards

Different Crime.Crime Name: Potential tax evasion under Income Tax Act
decision_outcome: Court upheld the visa officer's decision
procedural_fairness: Judicial review assessed whether procedural fairness and legal requirements were met by the visa officer
evidence_provided: Applicant failed to provide UK tax documents despite multiple reminders
applicable_statute: Tax evasion is an indictable offense in both Canada and the UK

identity_verification: doubted applicant’s intent to leave Canada post-expiry

Different Crime.Crime Name: Breach of procedural fairness/Breach of natural justice in immigration context

Procedural fairness requires interviews or responses under certain circumstances
judicial_review_process: Judicial review application heard in Federal Court
analyzed standards of review, factual errors, and procedural fairness
decision_outcome: ruling in favor of the applicant due to breached natural justice principles
burden_of_proof: undisclosed concerns (e.g., higher salary, limited family ties)
